column2:
"Oh, it's beautiful...
It's almost too beautiful to eat.
Surely it could become a weapon, too?"

"Even so, you're still going to hand them over,
aren't you, <%me>? Of course
you are, because you're such a good person."

"Don't worry, I won't let your hard work and
goodwill go to waste."

"I WILL complete this dish. And I'll prove I can
make it out of the galley!"

"素敵だわ……
食べちゃうのがもったいないくらいね。
きっと武器にもなるんでしょう？"

"それでも私に譲ってくれるなんて
<%me>さん！
あなたって、なんていい人なの？"

"<%me>さんの
善意を絶対に無駄にしないわ。"

"私、必ず料理を完成させて
厨房からはばたいてみせる！"
